plot: A vain girl is overtaken by her need to stay pretty, only to discover that there are worse things in life than wrinkles.
title: The Human Wrinkle Free
plot_es: A vain girl is overtaken by her need to stay pretty, only to discover that there are worse things in life than wrinkles.
plot_en: A vain girl is overtaken by her need to stay pretty, only to discover that there are worse things in life than wrinkles.
